summary: Admin Dashboard testing completed successfully. All backend APIs and frontend UI features working correctly. Login flow, protected routes, dashboard data display, funnel analytics, and logout functionality all verified.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin authentication uses JWT-style bearer tokens stored in localStorage - secure implementation
All admin routes properly protected with ProtectedAdminRoute component
Dashboard API returns comprehensive data: stats, funnel, popular_products, abandoned_carts, recent_orders, top_customers
Dutch language (Inloggen, Gebruikersnaam, Wachtwoord, Uitloggen) correctly implemented in UI
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Error handling displays user-friendly Dutch error messages
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data in MongoDB
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard is fully functional. Backend APIs: /api/admin/login (POST), /api/admin/verify (GET), /api/admin/dashboard (GET), /api/admin/orders (GET). All require Bearer token authentication except login. Frontend uses AdminAuthContext for state management and ProtectedAdminRoute for route protection.

admin_login_api.details: POST /api/admin/login returns token on success, 401 on invalid credentials

admin_verify_api.details: GET /api/admin/verify validates token and returns admin info

admin_dashboard_api.details: GET /api/admin/dashboard returns stats, funnel, popular_products, abandoned_carts, recent_orders, top_customers

admin_orders_api.details: GET /api/admin/orders returns list of all orders with count

login_ui.details: Login form with username/password fields, Dutch labels, error message display

dashboard_ui.details: Stats cards (revenue, orders, customers, conversion), funnel visualization, recent orders, popular products, abandoned carts, top customers all displayed

funnel_visualization.details: Shows checkout_started, orders_created, payments_completed with drop-off rates

logout_functionality.details: Logout button clears token and redirects to login page

login_error_handling.details: Wrong credentials show Dutch error message 'Ongeldige gebruikersnaam of wachtwoord'

tests_executed: Frontend: Login page loads with Dutch labels - PASS
Frontend: Login with correct credentials navigates to dashboard - PASS
Frontend: Dashboard displays all stats cards - PASS
Frontend: Funnel analytics card visible with all steps - PASS
Frontend: Recent orders, popular products, abandoned carts, top customers cards visible - PASS
Frontend: Navigation to orders page works - PASS
Frontend: Logout redirects to login page - PASS
Frontend: Protected routes redirect to login when unauthenticated - PASS
Frontend: Login error message displayed for wrong credentials - PASS
